ai-snp4.9:1.1_0: “Having seen (that), you can’t delight in craving,
ai-snp4.9:1.2_0: don’t have a consent for me.
ai-snp4.9:1.3_0: This sense is so full of ugliness!
ai-snp4.9:2.2_0: I was worshipped by the Lord of Men,
ai-snp4.9:2.3_0: Accomplished in view, or not the life of purity,
ai-snp4.9:2.4_0: who have rebirth in the future life?”
ai-snp4.9:3.1_0: ‘I say this’m not what you’re doing.
ai-snp4.9:3.5_0: The one who has given up oneself.”
ai-snp4.9:4.1_0: “Having given up the defilements, now what has been done,
ai-snp4.9:4.4_0: Those who understand what is internal and what is external.
ai-snp4.9:4.5_0: so how is one who is worshipped by the wise?”
ai-snp4.9:5.4_0: and Vāsavasabha, who are unattached to the views,
ai-snp4.9:5.5_0: And the ethical conduct occurs because of the finest.
ai-snp4.9:5.6_0: Having sat down at the very seat,
ai-snp4.9:6.1_0: “In that case, it seems, not easy to know or see,
ai-snp4.9:6.4_0: and Vāsavasabha, who are unattached to the views,
ai-snp4.9:6.5_0: And the ethical conduct occurs because of the finest.
ai-snp4.9:6.6_0: I am the one who understands the Dhamma,
ai-snp4.9:7.1_0: “Having been asked about, you should ask:
ai-snp4.9:7.3_0: being neglected by the noble ones.
ai-snp4.9:7.4_0: Anyone else should make him see,
ai-snp4.9:8.4_0: you’ll have no thought ‘I’m equal or special’.
ai-snp4.9:9.2_0: Or perhaps the momentary strikes you.
ai-snp4.9:9.3_0: In whom there is no roughest teaching,
ai-snp4.9:10.1_0: After leaving shelter to become an unsettled migrant,
ai-snp4.9:10.2_0: a sage doesn’t get close to anyone in town.
ai-snp4.9:10.3_0: and having done the best of sensual pleasures,
ai-snp4.9:11.1_0: Whoever would wander the world without roaming
ai-snp4.9:11.2_0: that a bull elephant would not say,
ai-snp4.9:11.3_0: like a drum from a peacock made of rose-apple,
ai-snp4.9:11.5_0: So there are who are not free from greed.
ai-snp4.9:11.6_0: There are noiling for sensual pleasures in the world,
ai-snp4.9:12.1_0: nor is attachment to view, nor is attachment to view?
ai-snp4.9:12.2_0: for the noble ones who still protect you,
ai-snp4.9:12.3_0: Not by deeds, not by someone else.
ai-snp4.9:13.2_0: for one who is freed by wisdom,
ai-snp4.9:13.3_0: and made the view of the best.
ai-snp4.9:13.4_0: they wander about in the world.”
